Class Player

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.Entity
model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Player extends Entity
Represents the player character controlled by the user. This class manages the player's state, position, movement, physics (gravity, jumping), and hitbox. It extends Entity and notifies observers of changes.
See Also:

  • Method Details

    • resetPosition

      public void resetPosition()
      Resets the player to their initial spawn point for the current level.

    • initHitbox

      protected void initHitbox()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Initializes the entity's hitbox. Concrete subclasses must implement this method to define the specific shape and size of their hitbox.
      Specified by:
      initHitbox in class Entity

    • updateHitbox

      protected void updateHitbox()
      Description copied from class: Entity
      Updates the hitbox's position to match the entity's current coordinates. This should be called whenever the entity moves.
      Overrides:
      updateHitbox in class Entity

    • applyGravity

      public void applyGravity(float gravity)
      Applies gravity to the player if they are in the air, updating their vertical velocity and position.
      Parameters:
      gravity - The gravitational force to apply.

    • jump

      public void jump()
      Makes the player jump if they are on the ground.

    • landOnGround

      public void landOnGround(float groundY)
      Called when the player lands on a solid surface.
      Parameters:
      groundY - The y-coordinate of the ground surface.

    • moveWithLift

      Moves the player along with a lift.
      Parameters:
      deltaY - The vertical distance the lift moved.

    • teleport

      public void teleport(int x, int y)
      Instantly moves the player to a new location.
      Parameters:
      x - The new x-coordinate.
      y - The new y-coordinate.
